name: ifpnotnotb
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(w2)), wn(wif(w0, w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: bicomi(wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(w2)), wn(wif(w0, w1, w2)))
stmt.pretty: bicomi(if(w0, ¬ w1, ¬ w2), ¬ if(w0, w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(w2)), wn(wif(w0, w1, w2)))
-| wb(wn(wif(w0, w1, w2)), wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(w2)), wn(wif(w0, w1, w2)))
-| wb(wn(wif(w0, w1, w2)), wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(w2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wn(wif(w0, w1, w2)), wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wif(w0, wn(w1), wn(w2)), wn(wif(w0, w1, w2)))

comment: Factor conditional logic operator over negation in terms 2 and 3. (Contributed by RP, 21-Apr-2020.)
